de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection

Class ImcConnectionAdapterIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection.AbstractImConnectionAdapter
      • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection.ImcConnectionAdapterIetf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImcConnectionAdapter, ImConnectionAdapter, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.AttributeSupport, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMCConnection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImcConnectionAdapterIetfLong

     class ImcConnectionAdapterIetf
extends AbstractImConnectionAdapter
implements ImcConnectionAdapter
    IMC connection adapter adapting a simple IMC connection according to IETF/TCG specifications.
